lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Balladur also proposed to make some extra cash available to the French national railways, SNCF, for the construction of high-speed rail track, and to boost research in the aerospace industry, he added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Reaffirming his long term strategy of cutting the state sector deficit and easing taxes, Chirac repeated government pledges to cut the corporate tax rate to 42 pct from 45 pct in the 1988 budget.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: About 75 pct of the additional revenue would be used to cut state debt and 25 pct to provide additional funds for public sector investment, he said.

lst.name: sentence
